mapper.insert: insert into scratch_log (wx_id, result, scratch_date, create_time) values (#{uid},#{result},#{scratchDate},#{createDate});
mapper.select: select * from scratch_log WHERE wx_id=#{uid} AND to_days(scratch_date)=to_days(#{scratchDate});
select * from scratch_log WHERE wx_id=#{id} AND date_add(curdate(), interval - day(scratch_date) + 1 day) = date_add(curdate(), interval - day(curdate()) + 1 day);
select sum(result) from scratch_log WHERE wx_id = #{id} AND date_add(scratch_date, interval - day(scratch_date) + 1 day) = date_add(curdate(), interval - day(curdate()) + 1 day);

SELECT wx_id id, sum(result) money FROM scratch_log WHERE date_add(scratch_date, interval - day(scratch_date) + 1 day) = date_add(curdate(), interval - day(curdate()) + 1 day) GROUP BY (wx_id) ORDER BY (sum(result)) DESC LIMIT #{size};
select * from scratch_log WHERE wx_id=#{id} AND to_days(scratch_date)=to_days(#{scratchDate});
